headline: Mar Vista Global Quality Q4 2024 Commentary
summary: The MSCI World Net Index climbed 18.7% for the year, marking its second consecutive annual gain above 15%, and capping a remarkable two-year run with a 47% total return.

headline: If I Could Only Pick 4 Investments To Buy And Hold Forever
